group.name: Plugin Commands: Ble Custom Ezsp
group.description: This plugin provides an implementation of Ble CLIs over custom EZSP protocol to communicate with dynamic multi-protocol (DMP) Zigbee-BLE NCP from Zigbee host application.

arg.name: channel-map
arg.description: Channel map indicating which of three channels will be used

arg.name: slave-latency
arg.description: number of connection intervals the slave can skip

arg.name: supervision-timeout
arg.description: time before the connection is dropped

arg.name: discoverable-mode
arg.description: The GAP discoverable mode: 0=non discoverable, 1=limited discoverable, 2=general discoverable, 3=broadcast, 4=user data

arg.name: connectable-mode
arg.description: The GAP connectable mode: 0=non connectable, 1=directed connectable, 2=undirected connectable, 3=scannable non connectable

arg.name: address
arg.description: The BLE address of the target device

arg.name: address-type
arg.description: The address type: 0=public, 1=random, 2=public resolved by the stack, 3=public resolved by the stack, 16=classic bluetooth
